messages.message:
Has anyone seen the following type of error when trying to run a celery group?
```EncodeError: Can't pickle <type 'function'>: attribute lookup __builtin__.function failed```
```
root_id = str(uuid.uuid4())
    job_metadata_dict = {
        JobConstants.ROOT_ID: root_id,
    }

    run_sig = tasks.get_run_refiner_v5_sig(form, root_id=root_id)
    echo_sig = tasks.echo.si (http://tasks.echo.si)(dict(status='OK', ignore=True))

    # From eob: I'm building it this way to plan for groups of files in the future
    # even though right now it only takes one file.
    final_final_sig = celery.group([run_sig, echo_sig]) | echo_sig

    job, err = jobs_util.run_group(
        current_app,
        request,
        celery.group([final_final_sig]),
        metadata=job_metadata_dict,
        timeout=JobConstants.JOBMETA_NUM_SECONDS)
```
